item.name: UPS Agent Version
item.description: apcupsd version number

item.name: UPS Battery Charge
item.description: Current battery capacity charge percentage

item.name: UPS Battery Time Left
item.description: Remaining runtime left on battery as estimated by the UPS

item.name: UPS Battery Voltage
item.description: Current battery voltage

item.name: UPS Cumulative Time On Battery
item.description: Cumulative seconds on battery since apcupsd startup

item.name: UPS Current Time On Battery
item.description: Seconds currently on battery

item.name: UPS Firmware Version
item.description: UPS firmware version

item.name: UPS Last Battery Change
item.description: Date battery last replaced (if set)

item.name: UPS Last Self Test
item.description: Date and time of last self test since apcupsd startup

item.name: UPS Last Transfer off Battery
item.description: Date, time of last transfer off battery since apcupsd startup

item.name: UPS Last Transfer Reason
item.description: Reason for last transfer to battery since apcupsd startup

item.name: UPS Last Transfer to Battery
item.description: Date, time of last transfer to battery since apcupsd startup

item.name: UPS Line Voltage
item.description: Current input line voltage

item.name: UPS Load
item.description: Percentage of UPS load capacity used as estimated by UPS

item.name: UPS Max Battery Runtime
item.description: Max battery runtime (TIMEOUT) after which system is shutdown

item.name: UPS Min Battery Charge
item.description: Min battery charge % (BCHARGE) required for system shutdown

item.name: UPS Min Battery Runtime
item.description: Min battery runtime (MINUTES) required for system shutdown

item.name: UPS Model
item.description: APC model information

item.name: UPS Nominal Battery Voltage
item.description: Nominal battery voltage

item.name: UPS Nominal Line Voltage
item.description: Nominal line voltage

item.name: UPS Nominal Power
item.description: Nominal power output in watts

item.name: UPS Number of Transfers
item.description: Number of transfers to battery since apcupsd startup

item.name: UPS Serial Number
item.description: UPS serial number

item.name: UPS Status (text)
item.description: UPS status (online, charging, on battery etc)

item.name: UPS Status Flag (raw)
item.description: UPS status flag in hex

item.name: UPS Voltage Sensitivity
item.description: Current UPS sensitivity setting for voltage fluctuations

item.name: UPS Voltage Threshold - High
item.description: Input line voltage above which UPS will switch to battery

item.name: UPS Voltage Threshold - Low
item.description: Input line voltage below which UPS will switch to battery

trigger.name: There is less than 10 minutes UPS runtime on {HOST.NAME}
There is less than 25 minutes UPS runtime on {HOST.NAME}
